scripts.fb:prod: node fabrique/actions/build.js && cd dist && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.fb:dev: node fabrique/actions/build.js --dev && cd dist && npm publish --quiet --registry http://localhost:4873 --tag beta
scripts.fb:dev:public: node fabrique/actions/build.js --dev && cd dist && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org --tag beta
